summary: Changes Basic effects of becoming a werewolf in human form.
descriptionHtml:
Just a small mod that changes the effects from getting the "Beast Blood", I always felt that when in human (or Mer) form you should have gotten at least a few perks for being a werewolf. This is my way of solving that.

An increase to Health + 50 and Stamina +100.
As well as an increase to regeneration.
An increased carry weight +100.

I also changed the werewolf health and stamina by just a smidgin. Instead of the +50 to Heath, and the +100 to Stamina to start with, I bumped them up to +100 and +150 respectively. Hopefully that still keeps it slightly balanced.

COMPATIBILITY

I only changed two records in the CK, the "ABWEREWOLF" and the "WEREWOLFIMMUNITY". If it changes that then this won't work. Both of these only deal with the Health and Stamina, and the disease resistance. Nothing in the PERKS themselves has been changed. Otherwise, I would place it after any werewolf mods you have, just to be on the safe side.

If you already have BEAST FORM in your spell list, then you may need to remove it, then add it back, If the effects aren't showing up. Most werewolf mods have a way to "cure" yourself, and then give it back. Or you can use the console to do it.

Thank you all who have checked this out. Its my first mod so feel free to be critical. Only way I'll learn.
author: DFG3179
